content: double_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet treble_crochet in chain-2 corner space 3 times skip next double_crochet single_crochet into next half_double_crochet treble_crochet into next half_double_crochet 16 times single_crochet in next double_crochet treble_crochet in first chain-2 corner space slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet 72 treble_crochet 72 single_crochet fasten_off round 11 you may need to substitute double_crochet or single_crochet for this row to get it up to your preferred size attach colour a with slip_stitch in any corner single_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in same st half_double_crochet into each of next 35 sts 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet into corner single_crochet 3 times half_double_crochet into each of next 35 sts slip_stitch into top of beginning chain-2 156 half_double_crochet 4 chain-2 sps fasten_off thank you to my helpful testers jojo99 stueysmom bioelle and amanda particularly a big thank you to joyce who not only let me adapt her pattern but tested/tech edited it and gave me no end of help and advice along the way 2015 lettice rose cow parsley afghan square page 4 of 4
